document_data.History: Morgan Longbow was sent to apprentice under a [[ranger]] to continue in his father's footsteps. By the time Morgan's education was finished and the young ranger returned home, his mother was murdered by a [[vampire]]. Morgan swore to avenger his deceased parent by exterminating the vampire threat from the world and subsequently, joined a group whose goal alined with his.
